content: {"name": "Burlington Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Diapers and Baby Food is available.\n\nClient should meet the income guidelines.", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "21 Murray Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Burlington", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": "01803", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.51480369999999, "longitude": -71.2035155}, "phones": [{"number": "(781) 270-6625", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Baby formula may be available"}]}
